description:
If you are a part of a volunteer group, a committee, or a member of a team at work, then you go to meetings regularly and at some point will be asked to conduct them. This course leads you through everything you need to know about running a meeting.

Learn to Conduct an Effective and Efficient Meeting that Group Members Enjoy Attending  

You will be able to:

  • Establish a clear purpose for the meeting by using the agenda effectively
  • Use TPRP meeting guidelines
  • Get meaningful feedback on issues from everyone attending the meeting
  • Learn a process for setting meeting goals and developing an action plan with your group   
  • Facilitate your meeting in a way that encourages teamwork


A Powerful Personal and Professional Skill

Understanding how to conduct a meeting is a leadership skill that you will use repeatedly in your personal and professional life. By the end of this course, you will have  the knowledge you need to lead a meeting with confidence. You will receive a certificate of completion upon finishing the course.
title: Meetings: How to Run an Effective, Successful Meeting
